faq.answer: We don't recommend it. faq.answer: Connecticut River valley humidity creates two problems: it attracts airborne particles that stick to panels more easily, and it can promote algae/mold growth at panel edges. This humidity-enhanced buildup reduces efficiency more than dry climates. Our purified water cleaning addresses both issues effectively.
